text.section: The State Investment Commission shall promulgate administrative regulations for the investment and reinvestment of state funds and the acquisition, retention, management, and disposition of investments.

law.history: Amended 1997 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 37, effective May 30, 1997. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 382, sec. 11, effective July 15, 1982.
